questions.question: How can you boost your posts on Facebook to reach more potential customers for free?
options: A) By using hashtags in your posts
C) By paying a subscription fee

questions.question: Hashtags are ........
options: A) Keywords used in posts to categorize content and improve searchability
B) Emojis used to express emotions in posts
C) Stickers added to posts for decoration

questions.question: Why should you go live on Facebook to promote your business?
options: A) Real-time interaction with customers and increased sales
B) Access to exclusive Facebook features

questions.question: What kind of Facebook profile do you need as a business owner to run ads?
